channel.title: Comments for Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Comment on Bane’s Headlock by Richard
item.dc:creator: Richard
item.description: One of my favorite blends! Berries and apples you can’t go wrong. Nice on a summer day. Never wears out on tongue. All day vape. Cloud Chem another fantastic flavor, thanks.
item.content:encoded: One of my favorite blends! Berries and apples you can’t go wrong. Nice on a summer day. Never wears out on tongue. All day vape. Cloud Chem another fantastic flavor, thanks.

item.title: Comment on Create Your Own Blend by Jeremiah Weaver
item.dc:creator: Jeremiah Weaver
item.description: I have made 5 different blends through Cloud Chemistry, and each blend has been 100% top quality. I ALWAYS make my own blends because it's so unique to do it that way. 100% suggest to make your own blend, they allow up to 5 different flavors, try it out!
item.content:encoded: I have made 5 different blends through Cloud Chemistry, and each blend has been 100% top quality. I ALWAYS make my own blends because it’s so unique to do it that way. 100% suggest to make your own blend, they allow up to 5 different flavors, try it out!

item.title: Comment on Apple Pie a La Mode by mattgallagher300
item.dc:creator: mattgallagher300
item.description: Man oh man. Let me tell u!!!! Apple Pie a la Mode goes crazy!!! I swear it taste just like my grandmas apple pie, fresh out the oven, with a scoop(or 2) of vanilla bean ice cream!!!YEESH!!!!!!!!!
item.content:encoded: Man oh man. Let me tell u!!!! Apple Pie a la Mode goes crazy!!! I swear it taste just like my grandmas apple pie, fresh out the oven, with a scoop(or 2) of vanilla bean ice cream!!!YEESH!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Comment on Mythical Milk by msemel
item.dc:creator: msemel
item.description: This is my new go to favorite! You guys are great, and thank you for going 100% online while your stores are closed. One less thing for us to worry about! Stay safe.
item.content:encoded: This is my new go to favorite! You guys are great, and thank you for going 100% online while your stores are closed. One less thing for us to worry about! Stay safe.

item.title: Comment on Elixir by Nicholas J, McKee
item.dc:creator: Nicholas J, McKee
item.description: This is a great and strong flavor. It has a perfect blending different fruit flavors into one great flavor. There was extremely quick delivery of the bottles to my house in just a day.
item.content:encoded: This is a great and strong flavor. It has a perfect blending different fruit flavors into one great flavor. There was extremely quick delivery of the bottles to my house in just a day.

item.title: Comment on Fan Service by jerseysr25
item.dc:creator: jerseysr25
item.description: Great company to get juice from. They answer questions via email very quickly and provided thorough answers to my questions. Very quick shipping too. And lastly the flavor was great and very unique.
item.content:encoded: Great company to get juice from. They answer questions via email very quickly and provided thorough answers to my questions. Very quick shipping too. And lastly the flavor was great and very unique.

item.title: Comment on Create Your Own Blend by dmdecker84
item.dc:creator: dmdecker84
item.description: Cloud Chemistry is great! Employees are friendly, place is nice and service is a-one! Love the fact I can get the mix of flavors I want with whatever nicotine I need. I won’t go anywhere else!
item.content:encoded: Cloud Chemistry is great! Employees are friendly, place is nice and service is a-one! Love the fact I can get the mix of flavors I want with whatever nicotine I need. I won’t go anywhere else!

item.title: Comment on Create Your Own Blend by Tasha Bertholf
item.dc:creator: Tasha Bertholf
item.description: I found this place by mistake, what a great place to get juice. I will never go any where else. I drive from NY to PA which is only 1 hour drive.
item.content:encoded: I found this place by mistake, what a great place to get juice. I will never go any where else. I drive from NY to PA which is only 1 hour drive.

item.title: Comment on Creamsicle by ms.borgeson
item.dc:creator: ms.borgeson
item.description: One of my favorite flavors. I’m working my way through all the flavors this is definitely one of the best. It’s the perfect amount of orange creamy Goodness, Reminds me of the ice cream pop soo freakin good! Definitely worth a try!
item.content:encoded: One of my favorite flavors. I’m working my way through all the flavors this is definitely one of the best. It’s the perfect amount of orange creamy Goodness, Reminds me of the ice cream pop soo freakin good! Definitely worth a try!

item.title: Comment on Stop the Flavor Ban by Cindy Cicero
item.dc:creator: Cindy Cicero
item.description: 9 years ago I was told to quit smoking for an operation. After 40+ years of smoking, this was hard. Until I found vaping. I used to get bronchitis every year and sometimes pneumonia. Until I started vaping, since then I HAVE NOT gotten sick. I for one know if vape stores were to be closed down, I most likely would start smoking again. Vape shops are essential to my well being. Cloud Chemistry please stay open. I can’t stand the taste of the other cheaper oils. Thank you
item.content:encoded: 9 years ago I was told to quit smoking for an operation. After 40+ years of smoking, this was hard. Until I found vaping. I used to get bronchitis every year and sometimes pneumonia. Until I started vaping, since then I HAVE NOT gotten sick. I for one know if vape stores were to be closed down, I most likely would start smoking again. Vape shops are essential to my well being. Cloud Chemistry please stay open. I can’t stand the taste of the other cheaper oils. Thank you
